categories.name: Stuffed
categories.description: Soft and cuddly handmade stuffed animals perfect for children and collectors alike. Each piece is crafted with care and attention to detail.

categories.name: Key Chain
categories.description: Unique and decorative key chains made with various materials and themes, ideal for personal use or as charming gifts.

categories.name: Grill Kit
categories.description: Complete grilling accessory kits, perfect for outdoor BBQs and family gatherings. Includes essentials for a great grilling experience.

categories.name: Board Game
categories.description: Creative and entertaining handmade board games for all ages. Perfect for family game nights and friendly competitions.

categories.name: Plush Bouquet
categories.description: Adorable bouquets made of small plush toys, combining the charm of flowers with the warmth of cuddly companions. Ideal for special occasions.
